• Contents
  • Index

ArguEdit.bin

Safe HaskellNone

ArguView

Description

This is the module that contains the major viewing functionality for Arguedit. That is, the argumentation components need a visual representation such as text boxes, clickable status icons and tree structured contains relation to have components belong to each other as wished.
